chunks.summary: The provision applies to applicants for UK visas who must demonstrate English language proficiency. It outlines the requirement to pass an approved English language test from a designated list to qualify for visa applications. Exceptions may apply for certain individuals, such as those with specific education qualifications or from English-speaking countries.
chunks.augmented_text:
Document: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
Part: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests

Summary: The provision applies to applicants for UK visas who must demonstrate English language proficiency. It outlines the requirement to pass an approved English language test from a designated list to qualify for visa applications. Exceptions may apply for certain individuals, such as those with specific education qualifications or from English-speaking countries.

chunks.summary: This provision applies to applicants seeking visas under the UK Immigration Rules who must demonstrate proficiency in English. The key requirement involves passing an approved English language test to meet immigration criteria. Exceptions may apply based on age, nationality, or existing qualifications.
chunks.augmented_text:
Document: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
Part: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
Section ID: Services and information
Section: Services and information

Summary: This provision applies to applicants seeking visas under the UK Immigration Rules who must demonstrate proficiency in English. The key requirement involves passing an approved English language test to meet immigration criteria. Exceptions may apply based on age, nationality, or existing qualifications.

chunks.summary: This section pertains to government activities related to the administration of immigration laws in the UK. It outlines the responsibilities of various departments and agencies in providing guidance, regulations, and transparency. Key conditions include the need for up-to-date assessments through official reports and consultations to ensure compliance with immigration requirements.

Section ID: Government activity
Section: Government activity

Summary: This section pertains to government activities related to the administration of immigration laws in the UK. It outlines the responsibilities of various departments and agencies in providing guidance, regulations, and transparency. Key conditions include the need for up-to-date assessments through official reports and consultations to ensure compliance with immigration requirements.

Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
=============================================================

List of English language tests that have been approved by the Home Office for English language requirements for limited leave to enter or remain under the Immigration Rules.

chunks.summary: This provision applies to applicants seeking limited leave to enter or remain in the UK. It outlines the requirement to complete an approved English language test as specified by the Home Office. Key conditions include that only certain tests are recognized, and applicants must meet the established English proficiency thresholds.
chunks.augmented_text:
Document: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
Part: Immigration rules Appendix O: approved English language tests
Section ID: Search
Section: Search

Summary: This provision applies to applicants seeking limited leave to enter or remain in the UK. It outlines the requirement to complete an approved English language test as specified by the Home Office. Key conditions include that only certain tests are recognized, and applicants must meet the established English proficiency thresholds.
